caption: Table 1: Comparison of models in terms of average inference time and overall accuracy on the AitW and AndroidControl datasets. The table presents the size of each model, the average inference time (in seconds, lower is better), and the overall accuracy (higher is better) for both datasets.
description: Table 1 compares different models' average inference time and overall accuracy on two datasets, showing LiMAC's superior performance.

caption: Table 4: Evaluation of three ablated versions of LiMAC using different types of input, on AndroidControl. For actions that require text completion, we use the fine-tuned Florence2.
